extendedInfo.description: Want to know the most recent happenings in south indian film industry. We have an unique way of collecting the news from different entertainment related site and provide you with the recent updates in a best way for you to read them in one single place. Covering up Tamil, Telugu, Kannada and Malayalam movie industries more interestingly delivered to your devices in just one app.We brings you the most recent news, new releases, launch events, new movie photo shoots, shooting spots, actor, actress pictures collected as a feed and show them in a photo gallery view. Utilizing the swipes gestures to navigate between the photos in full screen view.Feel free to send us your feedback and concern which would help us to make this app more interesting.

reviews.title: Gud
reviews.comment: Gud app it shows full news about cinema awesome but from 2 weeks its not working news are not showing in my mobile i am using Samsung galaxy GT 6802 please solve this problem i give 5 stars
reviews.author: Manju Sweety
